caption: Table 1: Evaluation of 5-NN weighted Kozachenko-Leonenko estimator on multidimensional uniformly distributed data. For each dimension dx = dy, 11 estimates of MI are acquired with the ground truth ranging from 0 to 10 with a fixed step. The RMSE of the estimated MI relative to the ground-truth MI is calculated for each set of estimates.
description: This table presents the results of evaluating the 5-NN weighted Kozachenko-Leonenko MI estimator on uniformly distributed multidimensional data.  For various dimensions (dx = dy), 11 MI estimates were generated, comparing estimates against ground truth values ranging from 0 to 10. The Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE) is shown for each dimension, indicating the accuracy of the estimator.

caption: Table 2: The NN architectures used to conduct the tests in Section 5.
description: This table presents the architectures of neural networks used for the experiments in Section 5 of the paper.  It lists the architectures used for autoencoders (AEs), MINE critic neural networks, GLOW, and RealNVP models, providing details of convolutional and dense layers, activation functions, pooling, upsampling, and the number of layers for each architecture.  This level of detail allows for reproducibility of the experiments.
